plain: Based on the user's favorite books, it can be inferred that their favorite genre is probably British literature, their favorite kind of plot is probably tragic, their favorite setting is probably rural England, their favorite writing style is probably descriptive and lyrical, their favorite length is probably novel-length, their favorite topic is probably the human condition, their favorite pacing is probably slow and contemplative, their favorite narrative structure is probably third-person omniscient, and their favorite themes are probably nature and isolation.
